text: Emmanuelle Riva (born Paulette Germaine Riva; 24 February 1927 - 27 January 2017) was a French actress, writer, photographer, and poet. She was known for her BAFTA Award-winning role as Anne in Amour. She was nominated for an Academy Award and won an BAFTA Award for her role in Amour.
